intro: High in the mountains of Albian, something very strange has happened.
description:
Gwendolyn the Fairy Godmother returns from a well-earned vacation to find Albian Village has vanished without a trace! Only her age-old castle remains, now a refuge for the displaced townsfolk. 
The culprit? A powerful and mysterious spell that’s left behind a wild surge of magical energy. 
To bring the village back, Gwendolyn must craft mighty counterspells—but the ingredients are very expensive!
Roll up your sleeves for a good old-fashioned hidden object adventure. 
Search every dusty drawer and forgotten hallway of Albian Castle for treasures worth their weight in gold. 
Solve clever mini-games, meet a cast of quirky characters, and uncover the truth behind the vanishing village! 
Packed with tons of hidden objects to uncover and plenty of magical upgrades to unlock, this classic-style hidden object game is bursting with charm, mystery, and magic!

Features:
- Classic seek and find fun with scenes full of hidden items
- Solve 160 clever mini-games and magical puzzles
- Discover a cast of quirky townsfolk
- Unlock a variety of castle upgrades as you progress
- Furnish and decorate a special magical chamber
